title: Oh What A Lucky Man
description: Raymond McClure is without a doubt a lucky man. But has he found himself with an abundance of good luck or bad luck? A power failure throws Ray into a tailspin that ultimately costs him his job. In the process he buys a lottery ticket on a whim. That evening Ray finds out he is the winner of a $216 Million jackpot. Unfortunately he has misplaced the ticket. A day at the grocery store, however, gives him new focusâ€”the chance to give rather than take. Ray volunteers at an elementary school and an eight-year-old Japanese girl helps to turn his life around. Join Raymond McClure on this roller coaster ride through joy and misfortune, incarceration and celebration, love and hate, loss and treasure.
author: Andrew H. Black
